Node.Text: Terribly. Last time we met, you didn't tell me the eagle was dead...
Alex! We're all just trapped here like animals, and now we'll all die! She was the only hope for stopping the viper...
Node.Hint: It seems like James didn't know about Alex's death until recently. He also had a positive opinion of her.

Node.Text: Now, all we can do is wait for it to strike again. I will see you around, Mr. Devlin.
Ah, I'm sorry, I forgot this was all just a game for you. We're just pieces to be picked off one by one, aren't we?
Know that I'll be watching your every move, Mr. Devlin. If you try anything to harm us, you'll be facing me.
I presume that you've heard of Alex's death by now?
Yes. I have. I can't believe you didn't mention her the last time I saw you. I'm starting to wonder what your role is in all this...
As I've said, I'm simply an elevator operator. This is my job.
Do you *really* believe that? You pry a lot for a neutral party...
There are more important matters at hand than where your loyalties lie. I will be leaving now.
